page.title: 10RECOVERY SERVICES
page.content:
There are several recovery services in the Dairsie area so there is a rota list for service which the police use. The trucks in Dairsie are a Bedford a Ford and a Landrover. The Landrover belongs to the garage and the other two belong to my Dad and his partner. There are lots of crashes in winter and Christmas and in summer.The reason for the crashes in winter is the snow and ice on the roads and in the summer the people on holiday in the area. It is quite in Spring time and Autumn.One of the recovery services has a Hiab which lifts one ton and one of the other trucks lifts up to five tons and has a bar for towing lorries. The landrover has a portable lifting gear.
Bryan Nicol
